summary: Local coach based on last 7 days. Latest pH=7.017, TDS=337.5 ppm, Temp=22.12 °C.

insights.recommendation: Aim 6.6–7.2; calibrate with 7.00/4.01 buffers; adjust slowly with pH up/down.
If high: partial water change/dilute; if low: remineralize/add nutrients; confirm K-factor.
Keep ~22–28 °C for tilapia; use heater/chiller; shade/aerate as needed.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.036 / 7.008 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 329.216 / 307.8 / 338.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.417 / 21.5 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
